alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, showers were located along a line extending from near Tollesboro to near Goddard, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Camp Dix, Rome, Rosemount, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Saint Paul, Firebrick, Carrs, West Portsmouth, Harris, Kinniconick, Tannery, Emerson, Turkey Creek Lake, Friendship, Charters and Garrison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
